Seriously Barcelona gets better every night we are here!  We struck out around the corner and walked into the nicest Tapas bar in town.  Both hostesses were so charming.  We were a party of five and had to wait about 40 minutes.  They walked us down the block to another bar and said they would come and get us.  She even checked in with us a couple times!  Our waitress on arrival reviewed the menu and gave suggestions, in English too.  We had Watermelon Goat cheese beet salad, Bravos, beef skewers, asparagus, spicy red shrimp, more bravos and a couple of their sandwiches.  Everything was perfect and the beet salad was super perfect.
